name: Wahenga Draft Game
description:
An old draft board of our ancestors, "Wahenga", was found. a board they used to plan their battles and strategy against their enemies. It's our duty to extend their traditions by creating strategies to capture and rule the empires of our enemies.

Play our draft game with family and friends on the same device or on different devices through a wi-fi network. Challenge and chat with them during the game. Explore every strategy and plan, be King or Queen and rule them all.
